hero.title: MAWA — Strength, Elegance, Community
hero.description: A serious memecoin with a strong identity — crocodile mascot, premium branding, and a long-term vision.
MAWA is a memecoin on Solana with a crocodile mascot, premium branding and a long-term vision.

home.vision_text: MAWA combines memecoin culture with serious execution. Premium branding, a public roadmap, and an engaged community.
MAWA combines memecoin culture with professional execution. Strong identity, locked liquidity and transparent tokenomics.

phases.desc: Premium branding, website launch, initial community building.
Social expansion, community engagement, pre-launch hype.
Official token launch on Jupiter, initial liquidity provision.
Listings on major Solana DEXs and project partnerships.
Centralized exchange listings and global expansion.
MAWA merchandise, NFT collections, community rewards programs.

items.q: Why choose MAWA over other memecoins?
items.a: MAWA stands out with premium branding, a long-term vision, the crocodile identity, locked liquidity (12 months), and transparent tokenomics.

items.q: Why a crocodile for a memecoin?
items.a: Crocodiles are resilient, adaptable, and patient hunters. They symbolize strength and apex predator status — qualities MAWA aims to reflect.

items.q: When exactly is the launch date?
items.a: MAWA is scheduled to launch on Jupiter on January 15, 2025. Follow our social channels for exact announcements and realtime updates.

items.q: Is the liquidity really locked for 12 months?
items.a: Yes. Liquidity will be locked for 12 months using verifiable on-chain locks via Jupiter Studio.

items.q: How can I join the MAWA community?
items.a: Join us on X: https://x.com/Mawathecroco and Telegram: https://t.me/mawasolana.

items.q: What are the tokenomics and fee structure?
items.a: Total supply: 1,000,000,000. Distribution: Liquidity 78%, Vested 2%, Migrating supply 20%. Transaction tax: 2%. LP lock: 12 months.
